Sentencas: The effect of the re-oxidation of anodes in anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cells was investigated.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) was used to observe the microstructure of the anode cross section.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction was used to measure the residual stress in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: The re-oxidation of the anode by ionic current was conducted at 800 degrees C by applying the current to a cell by supplying air for the cathode and pure N(2) for the anode.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: From the cross-sectional SEM images of the anodes, it was confirmed that the morphology of Ni particles in a particular area of the anode-an active area for electrochemical reactions-was modified to a sponge-like structure.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: It was reported that the spongy microstructure was generated when Ni was re-oxidized by 02 in air.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: On the other hand, the morphology change in the Ni particles outside of the active area was not observed.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: This suggests that this change in the microstructure resulting from re-oxidation was caused not by 02 in air but by the oxide ion current.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: The larger degree of morphology change in the Ni particles was observed in close proximity of the electrolyte, which also suggests that the re-oxidation was caused by the ionic current.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: These results indicate that the effect of the anode structure on the electrolyte re-oxidized by ionic current was successfully investigated without the influence of the gas phase.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: Then, the influence of anode expansion caused by the re-oxidation on the electrolyte is studied by measuring the residual stress in the electrolyte.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: A large compressive stress in the electrolyte was observed as that before the re-oxidation.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: The residual stress in the electrolyte under the cathode was found to be relaxed after passing the ionic current.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: On the other hand, the relaxation of the residual stress in the electrolyte outside the area of cathode was not measured.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current

Sentencas: This result is consistent with the microstructure observation results.
Titulo: Study on electrochemical re-oxidation of anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells using oxide ion current
